Module cloud.piranha.server
Package cloud.piranha.server

Class CrossContextWebApplication

java.lang.Object
cloud.piranha.webapp.impl.DefaultWebApplication
cloud.piranha.server.CrossContextWebApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebApplication, ServletContext
public class CrossContextWebApplication
extends DefaultWebApplication
This web application supports finding other contexts using ServletContext.getContext(String)
